name: FAnimNode_ModifyBone
doc: Simple controller that replaces or adds to the translation/rotation of a single bone.

BoneToModify: Name of bone to control. This is the main bone chain to modify from. *
Translation: New translation of bone to apply.
Rotation: New rotation of bone to apply.
Scale: New Scale of bone to apply. This is only worldspace.
TranslationMode: Whether and how to modify the translation of this bone.
RotationMode: Whether and how to modify the translation of this bone.
ScaleMode: Whether and how to modify the translation of this bone.
TranslationSpace: Reference frame to apply Translation in.
RotationSpace: Reference frame to apply Rotation in.
ScaleSpace: Reference frame to apply Scale in.
LODThreshold:
* Max LOD that this node is allowed to run
* For example if you have LODThreshold to be 2, it will run until LOD 2 (based on 0 index)
* when the component LOD becomes 3, it will stop update/evaluate
* currently transition would be issue and that has to be re-visited
Alpha: Current strength of the skeletal control
